title: I paused reading a book for 2 months and I don't remember the plot so far. What can I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are 2 obvious answers. Read it again, more thoroughly this time, or search the web for spoilers to jog your memory. I recommend the reading one, since if you read the half book, you’d obviously remember something. If not, shame on you. If you think reading is just looking at words and mindlessly flipping through pages, think again. To read is to imagine. As you read, you have to immersed within the book so much, you practically live the world, and can see, feel, taste, smell that world. Don’t be lazy and don’t ever disgrace the bookworm title. Sone people like to be called a bookworm, and take great pride in being one. You’re just gonna make the bookqorms near yoy mad and sad.

Like what the other answers suggest, rereading from the start would help. But if you are pressed for time, then I’d recommend skimming through the parts you have already read and try to recall what the main plot is. You can also skim as many times as you want to fill in the other relevant details like characters and setting if you wish.
